title: Support CLOCK_{PROCESS,THREAD}_CPUTIME_ID clocks
body: These clocks are important for profiling purposes.

comments.body: Add CLOCK_REALTIME to the list of needed support as reported in https://github.com/Microsoft/WSL/issues/2503. Microsoft should be advised that support of Clock functions that all inherently utilize CLOCK_REALTIME is required in order for WSL to be POSIX compliant.
